TITLE: CHOCOMINT
SUBTITLE: Senior high student, who engage in making C++ headers
AboutMeContent:
I'm now studying in TNFSH. I like to write code and research Math and Physics
I have learned C++ since I was in grade 7.
And now I'm coding some useful headers.(or call "wheels")
Recently, I'm learning OpenGL and developing Minecraft.
MatrixContent: You can announce variables with any type and operate them.
stringEXContent: There are some useful function in the header base on std.
complexContent: A header imitated the "complex" header in general C++
commonContent: There are some common function so that you don't need to write them again!
OperatorOverloadingContent: 想要用與眾不同的方法寫出像 add(A,B) 這樣麻煩的東西嗎? 這個課程保證讓你收穫滿滿！
GeometryContent: 將所有的幾何小知識濃縮在這本幾何筆記中，看完保證使你收穫滿滿！
ConicContent: 匯集關於圓錐曲線的性質與定理。透過這本筆記與圓錐曲線打好關係吧！
VectorContent: 從線積分、面積分，到格林定理、斯托克斯定理，都在這篇筆記當中！
LaplaceContent: 還在為解微分方程式而困擾嗎? 教你用最硬的方式解微分方程式！
VariationContent: 最速降線是甚麼?! 帶你了解如何算出一系列曲線對某作用造成的的極值！
HeadersSubTitle: Here are some C++ headers resources, enjoy!
HeaderDownloaderContent:
You can download all the headers in this application!
This application will update automatically when some headers are uploaded on the github. Therefore, you don't have to download again except for the new release.

Special Thank:
Tech Support By Coding Bear
